name: Fata Morgana
description:
Made for Brackeys 2022.1 Game Jam

You play as an adventurer trying to find the fabled city in the desert of a post-apocalyptic world. You need to manage your thirst and your tiredness in order to keep alive and decrease the chances of mirages

-Controls-

- You can continue one square at a time on the grid.

- Every move reduces your Sleep and Thirst gauge.

- The lower the sleep gauge, the higher the chance of mirages you see.

- You can get directions from the compass tile.

- WASD to move the camera
